title: Planetarium App Design
description: The goal of this project was to design an possible oficial app for the Porto Planetarium that fulfilled the needs of the staff, this meant that it should include a away of interacting with the public during sessions, listening to audio based on the QR codes of the initial Planetarium exibhition, seeing a calendar with the events, buy session tickets and learn more about the history of the Planetarium. This design was created not only by me but also by Mariana Caridade and Hugo Carvalho.

images.title: Sample Screens
images.description: Landing page, homepage, audio guide page and session quiz page, respectively from left to right

images.title: Login and Calender
images.description: The user can login to the app and check the calender and Planetarium events.

images.title: Quiz
images.description: The user can use the app to participate in Planetarium sessions, through a quiz like form.

images.title: Audio and History
images.description: The user can listen to the audio guide through the QR Codes as well as check historical information about the Planetarium.

description: This was a game made in the earlier stages of the pandemic, for a Digital Games class. It is a 2D platformer game that intends to joke a little bit about the pandemic situation.

title: Music Taste Visualizer
description: This project was made for a Project class in the last year of my Bachelor's degree, it was made in collaboration with Maria Soares and Maria Figueira. In this project we were given freedon to create any interactive multimedia artifact, we chose to create a website that would make people closer through music. This project is a multiuser website that uses the Spotify API so that the users can enter and add/remove visual representations of their favorite songs, their favorite playlists and favorite artists. This creates an online artboard filled with several user's favorite music. At the end of the project, UX/UI user testing was done and we received good results.

title: The Joke | Interactive Website
description: In this project we had to represent a short story making use of multimedia technologies. We chose to create an interactive website about The Joke, a short story by Anton Checkov. Our concept was to explore the story and mix it with a bit of research about the author, so we can see the story being written on the side as well as SVG animations and illustrations about it but this is mixed with written notes and pictures about Checkov's life and society context.

title: Ilustrations (Pack 1)
description: This project is a gathering of some ilustrations made around the theme of flowers (a very common theme for me, I love flowers and drawing them), with some added other elements. All the drawings were made in Adobe Illustrator.

title: Soup Festival (Festival das Sopas)
description: This was a freelance project made for the Soup Festival in Figueira de Lorvão. The briefing included the need for posters and social media posts. The identity uses warm colors to relate to the warmth of soup and a fun and think font to appeal to the festival side and to improve visibility. This project was made using Adobe Illustrator, Premiere Pro and After Effects.

title: The Bucket Rider Animation
description: For this project we had to chose a short story to animate. Me and my colleague Maria Figueira chose The Bucket Rider by Franz Kafka.

title: Design, Art and Technology Conference Identity
description: This was a project made in the scope of a course about visual identities, the first branding project I ever made. It was in collaboration with Maria Soares. The briefing included creating a branding for the DAT(Design, Art and Technology) conference, which should include a website and posters.

title: Wedding Guide
description: This was a freelance project made for a wedding. The briefing included the need for a flyer or editorial element with the steps of the wedding ceremony. There were no specific requirements just that it should be elegant and simple. I drawed a rose for the cover and a rose stem for the back and the rest of the work was maily typographical. This project was made using Adobe In Design.

title: Stanley Morrison Flyer
description: This was a project made for a Typography class where we had to make a flyer that showed information about a Typographer and their most famous font. My flyer is about Stanley Morrison, the creator of Times New Roman. The front of the flyer has all the information and the back has big poster.

title: Self Portrait
description: This was a project made for a Photography class where we had to present a self portrait. The overall look of the pictures is dark because the goal is to show the not so happy parts of me. Each gesture in a away shows an insecurity or dilema.

title: What is Happiness?
description: This was a project made for a Design class where we had to illustrate what is happiness and of course my brain went immediately to food.

title: Apropriation | Duane Michals
description: This was a project made for a Photograohy class where we had to chose some of our favorite photographers and create images based on there works. These should include exact copies and adaptations. In the case of Duane Michals I chose to create two exact copies.

title: Apropriation | Gregory Crewdson
description: This was a project made for a Photograohy class where we had to chose some of our favorite photographers and create images based on there works. These should include exact copies and adaptations. Gregory Crewdson is one of my most favorite photographers, so I chose him to work on. I tried to create one exact copy, the picture in the cover and two inspired photos.

title: Poster for Tomorrow
description: These posters were made for the contest Poster for Tomorrow, in the scope of a class. The goal was to make posters that would alert to the environmental crisis.

title: Country Pictograms
description: In this project, we were given random countries and had to create coherent pictograms that represented them. I chose to use country legends and national animals.

images.title: Legend Based Pictograms
images.description: Each pictogram sums a legend from the refered country through drawings. Notice that each pictograms composition is similar, to make them more coherent.

images.title: National Animal Based Pictograms
images.description: Each pictogram is a geometrized image of the country's national animal. Notice that, despite them all being different, they still follow the same desin principles and therefore work well together.

title: Hundreds 2.0 | In the Outer Space
description: For this project we had to recreate the game Hundreds in Processing but giving it a little twist, therefor this is the game when its elements are switched to space elements. This project was in collaboration with Maria Figueira.

title: Revolution
description: This was a project made for a Design class where we had to create a collage. I chose to do a collage fusing the portuguese revolution of April 25th and cellphones, touching upon the concept of how revolutions have gotten a very strong online component.
